subject: Cannot login to my account
body: I've been trying to login to my account for the past hour but keep getting an 'Invalid credentials' error. I'm sure my password is correct because I just reset it yesterday. I've tried clearing my browser cache and cookies but nothing works. This is urgent as I need to access my billing information.

subject: Double charged for subscription
body: I noticed two charges of $49.99 on my credit card statement dated December 10th and December 11th. Both charges are for the monthly Pro subscription. Please refund the duplicate charge immediately. My account email is sarah.j@company.com and the last 4 digits of my card are 4532.

subject: Application crashes when exporting to PDF
body: Every time I try to export my report to PDF format, the application crashes with error code 0x80070005. I'm running Windows 11 and have the latest version of the app (v3.2.1). The crash happens regardless of the report size. I've attached the crash log. This is blocking my work as I need to send these reports to clients.

subject: How to upgrade to Enterprise plan?
body: Our company is growing and we need to upgrade from the Team plan to Enterprise. Can you provide information about the Enterprise features, pricing, and migration process? We currently have 45 users and expect to grow to 100+ in the next quarter.

subject: Password reset email not arriving
body: I requested a password reset 3 times today but haven't received any emails. I've checked my spam folder and added your domain to my safe senders list. My email is thomas.w@gmail.com. I need access to my account urgently for a project deadline.

subject: API rate limit exceeded unexpectedly
body: Our integration started receiving 429 errors this morning even though we're well below our plan's rate limit. According to our logs, we're only making about 500 requests per minute, but our Enterprise plan allows 2000/min. Can you check if there's an issue on your end? API key ends in ...x7f9.

subject: Request for invoice copy
body: I need a copy of the invoice from October 2025 for our accounting records. The invoice number should be INV-2025-10-78432. Please send it to accounting@mycompany.com. Thanks!

subject: Feature request: Dark mode
body: I use your application extensively at night and would really appreciate a dark mode option. The bright white interface causes eye strain during long work sessions. Many of my colleagues have mentioned the same issue. Is this feature on your roadmap?

subject: Data sync not working between mobile and desktop
body: Changes I make on the mobile app are not syncing to the desktop version and vice versa. I've tried logging out and back in on both devices. Mobile: iPhone 15 with iOS 17.1, app version 2.8.3. Desktop: macOS Sonoma, app version 3.2.1. This started happening after the last update.

subject: Cancel my subscription
body: Please cancel my subscription effective immediately. I'm no longer using the service and don't want to be charged for the next billing cycle on December 20th. Please confirm once cancelled and let me know if there's a prorated refund available.

subject: Account hacked - unauthorized access
body: URGENT: Someone has accessed my account without permission. I see login attempts from IP addresses in Russia and China that aren't mine. Several of my saved documents have been deleted. Please lock my account immediately and help me recover my data. I need this escalated to security team!

subject: Slow performance on large files
body: When working with files larger than 50MB, the application becomes extremely slow and sometimes freezes. Opening a 100MB file takes over 2 minutes. My system specs: 32GB RAM, Intel i7-12700K, NVMe SSD. This wasn't an issue before version 3.0.

subject: Need to change billing email
body: Please update the billing email address on our account from old.billing@company.com to new.billing@company.com. We've restructured our finance department. The account name is TechCorp Industries, customer ID CUST-33333.

subject: Integration with Salesforce broken
body: The Salesforce integration that was working perfectly until yesterday is now returning 401 Unauthorized errors. We haven't changed any credentials or permissions. This is affecting our entire sales team's workflow. Need immediate assistance.

subject: Discount code not applying
body: I'm trying to apply the discount code HOLIDAY25 at checkout but it says the code is invalid. I received this code in your promotional email yesterday. I'm trying to upgrade to the annual plan. Can you help apply the discount?

subject: Two-factor authentication not working
body: I can't complete login because the 2FA codes from my authenticator app are being rejected. I've verified my phone's time is synced correctly. I set up 2FA about 6 months ago and it was working fine until today. I have backup codes but they're in my account settings which I can't access.

subject: Webhook notifications delayed
body: We're experiencing significant delays (30+ minutes) in receiving webhook notifications for events. Our endpoint is responding correctly (we've tested with requestbin). This is causing issues with our real-time dashboard. Webhook URL: https://api.ourapp.com/webhooks/yourservice

subject: Refund request for unused months
body: I paid for an annual subscription in March but have decided to switch to a competitor. I'd like a prorated refund for the remaining 3 months of my subscription. According to your refund policy, this should be possible. Order ID: ORD-2025-03-45678.

subject: Unable to delete account
body: I want to delete my account and all associated data per GDPR requirements. However, the 'Delete Account' button in settings is grayed out. I've already cancelled my subscription and exported my data. Please help me complete the account deletion process.

subject: Print function not working in Chrome
body: When I click Print in Chrome (version 120), nothing happens. No print dialog appears. It works fine in Firefox and Edge. I've tried disabling all extensions and clearing the cache. Is this a known issue? My Chrome is up to date.

subject: SSO configuration returns invalid assertion error
body: We just rotated our SAML IdP certificates and now all SSO logins fail with 'Invalid SAML Assertion' error. Our entire team of 85 people is locked out. We're using Okta as our identity provider. This is preventing all work today - please escalate immediately.

subject: Need consolidated invoice for all workspaces
body: We have 5 separate workspaces each with their own billing. Our finance department needs a single consolidated invoice for all workspaces. Can you combine them under one billing account? Company: Amalgamated Holdings, Cust ID: CUST-10202.

subject: SCIM provisioning not deprovisioning users
body: When we remove users from the application group in Azure AD, they are not being deprovisioned in your platform. SCIM sync shows successful but users still have active access. This is a security compliance issue for us.

subject: Automation rules creating duplicate notifications
body: Our auto-assignment automation rule is triggering twice for every new ticket created. This means assignees get duplicate email and Slack notifications. The rule has been working fine for 3 months - this started after your last platform update.

subject: Custom domain SSL not auto-renewing
body: Our custom domain app.ourcompany.com is showing SSL certificate warnings since yesterday. The certificate should have auto-renewed but it appears it hasn't. Our customers are seeing 'Not Secure' warnings. DNS records haven't changed.

subject: Request: Conditional logic in automations
body: We need the ability to add if/else branching logic in automation workflows. Currently we have to create separate rules for each condition, which is hard to manage. Something like: IF priority = P1 THEN assign to senior team ELSE assign to general queue.

subject: Data residency migration request EU
body: Due to new GDPR enforcement in our country, we need to migrate our workspace data from US-East to EU-Frankfurt region. We have approximately 500GB of data. What is the process and expected timeline for this migration?

subject: Wire transfer payment not reflected in account
body: We sent a wire transfer payment of â‚¬12,450 on December 10th for our annual Enterprise renewal. Reference: WT-2025-12-78901. The payment has cleared our bank but our account still shows as 'Payment Due'. Please confirm receipt.

subject: How do I get the HIPAA BAA signed?
body: We're a healthcare startup evaluating your platform. Before we can proceed, we need a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) signed for HIPAA compliance. What is the process? Is this available on the Business plan or only Enterprise?

subject: File upload stuck at 99% on Safari
body: Every file upload above 10MB freezes at 99% on Safari 17.2. I've tried both macOS Sonoma and iOS 17. Worked fine two weeks ago. Smaller files upload fine. Chrome works without issues. Our team is heavily Mac-based so this affects many users.

subject: Workspace accidentally deleted need recovery
body: One of our admins accidentally deleted our main project workspace 'Q4 Launch' about 2 hours ago. It contained 3 months of work for our entire product team. I see in your docs there's a 30-day grace period - can you please restore it immediately? Workspace ID: WS-45678.

subject: API pagination returning duplicate records
body: When paginating through our items using cursor-based pagination, we're getting duplicate records across page boundaries. It seems like items modified between page fetches appear on both pages. This is causing data integrity issues in our sync pipeline.

subject: Request for multi-language platform support
body: Our organization operates in 6 countries. We need the platform interface available in French, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Portuguese in addition to English. Is internationalization on your roadmap? This is a key requirement for our global rollout.

subject: Reports timing out for datasets over 10k records
body: Generating our monthly activity report with about 15,000 records consistently times out after 5 minutes. Last month's report with 9,000 records worked fine. We've tried narrowing date ranges but we need the full month. This is blocking our board presentation prep.

subject: What training resources do you offer?
body: We're onboarding 50 new employees next month and want to get them up to speed on the platform quickly. Do you offer any training sessions, webinars, or onboarding materials? We'd also be interested in custom training for our specific workflows.

subject: IP allowlisting blocking legitimate users
body: After enabling IP allowlisting yesterday, some of our remote employees in Southeast Asia are being blocked. Their IPs are dynamic and change frequently. Is there a way to allowlist IP ranges or use an alternative method like VPN or device certificates?

subject: Tax exemption not applied to latest invoice
body: We uploaded our tax exemption certificate (501c3 nonprofit) two weeks ago and it was approved. However, our latest invoice from December 15 still includes $487.50 in sales tax. Please remove the tax and issue a corrected invoice.

subject: CSV import encoding issues with Japanese characters
body: When importing our CSV file containing Japanese text (client names in kanji/hiragana), all non-ASCII characters are replaced with garbled symbols. The file is saved as UTF-8. We've tried UTF-8 BOM as well. About 40% of our records are affected.

subject: Want kanban board and calendar view
body: Our project management team would greatly benefit from a kanban board view (like Trello) and a calendar view for deadline tracking. Currently we export to Trello for visual planning which is inefficient. These views would help us consolidate our tooling.

subject: Audit log incomplete - missing deletion events
body: During our quarterly security audit, we noticed that bulk deletion events performed via the API are not appearing in the audit log. Individual deletions through the UI are logged correctly. This is a compliance issue - we need all data modifications tracked.
